channel.title: CVE Feed for org.opencms -- opencms-core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for org.opencms -- opencms-core

item.title: CVE-2021-25968|2024-08-03T20:19:18.982Z -- org.opencms -- opencms-core
item.description: In “OpenCMS”, versions 10.5.0 to 11.0.2 are affected by a stored XSS vulnerability that allows low privileged application users to store malicious scripts in the Sitemap functionality. These scripts are executed in a victim’s browser when they open the page containing the vulnerable field.
